var gdt = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue(); var gdt1 = new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue(); var nodeId = gs.getProperty('Specification - SASE NODE');
var serviceID = '', serviceOrderNbr = '', serviceComponentId ='', saseVendor = '', serviceLevel = '', productType = '', oneTimeType = '', quantity = '', firewall = '', sdWan = '', saseRemote = '', secureWebGateway = '', supportInc = '', onsiteInstall = '', highAvail = '', deployType = '', onPrem = '', size = '', vendor = '', model = '', bandwidthLevel = '', piid = '', ztnaRemote = '', ztna = '';
var customerCommit = ""; var customerReqDate = "";
var jsonVal1; var jsonVal2
// Service Address var serviceAddress='';//, locationCity,locationStreet,locationZip,locationState,locationCountry;
var location = new GlideRecord('cmn_location'); location.query("sys_id", inputs.orderLineItem.location.sys_id); location.query(); if(location.next()){ serviceAddress = location.street+","+ location.city+","+ location.state+","+ location.country+"-"+location.zip; } else{ serviceAddress = ""; }
var grNode = new GlideRecord('sn_ind_tmt_orm_order_characteristic_value'); grNode.addQuery('order_line_item', inputs.LineItemSys_id); grNode.addQuery('specification', nodeId); grNode.query(); while (grNode.next()) { if(grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - SASE Vendor')){ saseVendor = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - On Premises CPE Option')){ onPrem = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Model')){ model = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Limit Bandwidth in Mbps')){ bandwidth = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristic.bandwidthLicenselevel')){ bandwidthLevel = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Firewall Indic.')){ firewall = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Secure Web Gateway Indic.')){ secureWebGateway = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Design and Implementation Support Indic.')){ supportInc = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - On Site Installation Indic.')){ onsiteInstall = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - High Availability Indic')){ highAvail = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Deployment Type')){ deployType = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristics-vendor')){ vendor = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - ProductInstanceID(PIID)')){ piid = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristics.productType')){ productType = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristic.oneTimeEventType')){ oneTimeType = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristic.ztna')){ ztna = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Customer Commit Date')){ customerCommit = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Customer Requested Date')){ customerReqDate = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - ZTNA Remote Access Indic')){ ztnaRemote = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } }
// SASE Activation SWG Task jsonVal1 = { "messageId": "SN-"+inputs.orderId, "messageTime": gdt, "messageType": "serviceNowCreateTask", "messageName": "ODC.PROD.WORKMATE.ENTERPRISE.WORK.SERVICENOWTASK.COMMAND", "responseName": "DDC.PROD.LUMEN-SERVICENOW.ENTERPRISE.ORDERORCHESTRATION.SERVICENOW.WORKMATETASKRESPONSE.COMMAND", "pattern": "Command", var gdt = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue(); var gdt1 = new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue(); var nodeId = gs.getProperty('Specification - SASE NODE');
var serviceID = '', serviceOrderNbr = '', serviceComponentId ='', saseVendor = '', serviceLevel = '', productType = '', oneTimeType = '', quantity = '', firewall = '', sdWan = '', saseRemote = '', secureWebGateway = '', supportInc = '', onsiteInstall = '', highAvail = '', deployType = '', onPrem = '', size = '', vendor = '', model = '', bandwidthLevel = '', piid = '', ztnaRemote = '', ztna = '';
var customerCommit = ""; var customerReqDate = "";
var jsonVal1; var jsonVal2
// Service Address var serviceAddress='';//, locationCity,locationStreet,locationZip,locationState,locationCountry;
var location = new GlideRecord('cmn_location'); location.query("sys_id", inputs.orderLineItem.location.sys_id); location.query(); if(location.next()){ serviceAddress = location.street+","+ location.city+","+ location.state+","+ location.country+"-"+location.zip; } else{ serviceAddress = ""; }
var grNode = new GlideRecord('sn_ind_tmt_orm_order_characteristic_value'); grNode.addQuery('order_line_item', inputs.LineItemSys_id); grNode.addQuery('specification', nodeId); grNode.query(); while (grNode.next()) { if(grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - SASE Vendor')){ saseVendor = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Service Level')){ serviceLevel = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Size')){ size = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - On Premises CPE Option')){ onPrem = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Model')){ model = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Limit Bandwidth in Mbps')){ bandwidth = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristic.bandwidthLicenselevel')){ bandwidthLevel = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Firewall Indic.')){ firewall = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Secure Web Gateway Indic.')){ secureWebGateway = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Design and Implementation Support Indic.')){ supportInc = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - On Site Installation Indic.')){ onsiteInstall = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - High Availability Indic')){ highAvail = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Deployment Type')){ deployType = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristics-vendor')){ vendor = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - ProductInstanceID(PIID)')){ piid = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristics.productType')){ productType = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristic.oneTimeEventType')){ oneTimeType = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('characteristic.ztna')){ ztna = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Customer Commit Date')){ customerCommit = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - Customer Requested Date')){ customerReqDate = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } else if (grNode.characteristic == gs.getProperty('Characteristic - ZTNA Remote Access Indic')){ ztnaRemote = ""+grNode.characteristic_option_value.toString(); } }
